main_definition: achieving maximum productivity with minimum wasted effort or expense.

meanings_and_examples.definition: capable of accomplishing a task with little waste of time and resources, without unnecessary complications
meanings_and_examples.example: The company implemented new software to make their work processes more efficient.

meanings_and_examples.definition: having an ability to perform tasks quickly, precisely, and effectively
meanings_and_examples.example: She was very efficient at her job, completing all tasks on time with great accuracy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: achieving a result using the least amount of effort or resources possible
meanings_and_examples.example: To be environmentally friendly, we try to use energy-efficient appliances in our home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: in terms of design and functionality, something that is effective without being complicated or wasteful
meanings_and_examples.example: Their new car model was praised for its efficiency, offering great mileage while still providing modern features.
